Title: Directs a study of the availability of wheelchair accessible vehicles in New York state outside of the city of New York
Summary: Directs the department of transportation to conduct a study of the availability of wheelchair accessible vehicles, by county, in New York state outside of the city of New York; defines accessibility; requires a report to identify any existing local guidelines for accessible vehicles; directs development of benchmarks for increasing wheelchair accessible vehicles.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to a study of the availability of wheelchair accessible vehicles in New York state outside of the city of New York
